name: starting-wizard
description: Cool wizard to display after theme or plugin install

scripts.watch: npx vue-cli-service build --inline-vue --watch --no-clean --report-json --dest assets && npx tailwindcss -i ./src/assets/scss/index.scss -o ./assets/css/index.css --watch
scripts.prod: npx vue-cli-service build --inline-vue --report-json --dest assets && npx tailwindcss -i ./src/assets/scss/index.scss -o ./assets/css/index.css --minify

author: George Tudor
